column1:
public int nextInt(int n) {
         if (n<=0)
    		throw new IllegalArgumentException(""n must be positive"");
    
         if ((n & -n) == n)  // i.e., n is a power of 2
             return (int)((n * (long)next(31)) >> 31);
    
         int bits, val;
         do {
             bits = next(31);
             val = bits % n;
         } while(bits - val + (n-1) < 0);
         return val;
     }
